input.sentences: a group of adults gathered at a room to listen to readers tell stories .
the room was mostly dark except for a spotlight shining on the stage .
at the stage stood the readers with a piece of paper and a microphone on a stand .
the readers told their stories with energy and focus .
a couple who attended the readings were very pleased with their experience .
output.sentences: Every Thursday I go to a readers club where people tell and listen to stories.
This week it was my turn to read a story and it felt great to be on stage with the spotlight shining on me.
I stood on the stage ind spoke into the mic stand.
I told my best stories to all the other fellow readers.
When I was done with my stories, all the other readers seemed pleased with the experience.
